text: Irina Nikolayevna Vorobieva (; June 30, 1958 – April 12, 2022) was a Russian pair skater. She competed for the Soviet Union. She and Igor Lisovsky were the 1981 World champions and the 1981 European champions. They were married. She came in 4th at the 1976 Olympics. Vorobieva was born in Leningrad, Soviet Union. Vorobieva died on April 12, 2022 in Colorado Springs, Colorado at the age of 63.Ушла из жизни прославленная советская фигуристка Ирина Воробьева ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Russian figure skaters Category:Competitors at the 1976 Winter Olympics
title: Irina Vorobieva
